trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around November 18th 2013
Summary: Looked up at a plane passing by in Nashville and saw a disk like object fly near by at rate ive never seen before. Went right to left first before taking off.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was having a cigarette outside our hotel and looked up at a passing plane heading west. I then saw a disk like object with a redish light very close to the plane which i felt was strange but this was not a helicopter or a plane because it started to head north and went from right to left at a ridiculous speed and then shot at a blink of an eye north west. I called FAA but they told me to contact someone that wasnt in the "threat department" but it was a threat because it was flying so close to the plane. I called back but got no where so I really have to report this because it was something that we do not possess for technology that I know of, whatever this thing was... Please get back to me if youve heard similar calls please. ---Ryan
